item.content:encoded:
Luxury services

Revitalise your mind, body and spirit with the luxury spa treatments.

Beauty Bring brighter and younger looking skin. Therapy Bring brighter and younger looking skin. Massage Bring brighter and younger looking skin. What we offer

Explore our spa and body services

Previous Next Touch the body

Body massage

The daily grind of work and personal life needs takes a toll on your body and mind. A regular selfcare routine helps you unwind, relax and re-energise.

$20 20% off Book now Read More Previous Next Exhale happiness

Unforgettable treat Relax your mind soul and body Book appointment Ayurvedic treatments Help for your mind relaxing Book appointment Therapy packages Therapy for rest and relaxation Book appointment Previous Next Ultra luxury studio

Modern infrastructure

Certified manpower

Amazing experience

Natural environment

Unwind and discover joy

Ayurvedic therapy

Herbal remedies

About studio

Relax at the luxury spa massage and therapy studio.

A design-led approach guides the team, implementing practices, products and services that are thoughtful and environmentally sound. Family of professionals that creates intelligent designs that help the face of hospitality.

Explore more 1 800 222 000 Started in 1995

9.98

Google reviews

30k

Instagram followers

96%

Repeat customers

28+

Years of experience Luxury services

Explore our spa and body services

Beauty

Bring brighter and younger looking skin.

01 Therapy

Bring brighter and younger looking skin.

02 Massage

Bring brighter and younger looking skin.

03 Beauty

Bring brighter and younger looking skin.

01 Therapy

Bring brighter and younger looking skin.

02 Massage

Bring brighter and younger looking skin.

03
Revitalize your senses and refresh? Explore package
Makeup & massage $43 50 Minute relaxation massage. Relaxing head $45 One of the best ways to relax head. Geothermal spa $39 Comforting stimulating atmosphere. Body relaxation $35 Progressive muscle relaxation. Finnish sauna $55 Traditional finnish sauna experience. Aromatherapy $35 Using concentrated essential oils. Spa therapy for rest and RelaxationEnjoymentHappiness Benefits of spa

100% natural and organic products.

Everybody is looking for places where to relax and get more energy. Revitalize your senses and refresh your mind.
  • Increased happiness
  • Promotes radiant skin
  • Promotes a better sleep
View treatments The wonderful services you offer locally are great for our community. People are tired of having to travel out of town for things. Jonsan donner Relax massage This place is beautiful. The outside, the inside, staff communication is all on point! The staff is very friendly, informative and patient. Lauren cruikshank Relax massage The ambiance as soon as you enter puts you at ease immediately. The staff is so sweet and generous and the services they offer are to die for! Rosemary downing Scalp massage Prev Next
